title: Were Hurricane Katrina ‘Looting’ Photographs Captioned Differently Based on Race?
subtitle: News photographs alternately described subjects of different races as 'looting' or 'finding' supplies in the wake of Hurricane Katrina.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: News photograph captions described a black man "looting" and a white couple "finding" supplies in the wake of Hurricane Katrina.
